text: qal khznt jahanam lahum twbykhana: hdha alduea' la yanfaeukum fi shy', 'awalam tatkm rusulukum balhjj alwadihat min allah fkdhbtmwhm? faetrf aljahdwn bdhlk wqalu: bla. ftbra khznt jahanam minhum wqalu: nahn la nadeu lkm, wala nshfe fykm, fadeuu antm, wlkn hdha alduea' la yughni shyyana; lankm kafrwn. wama duea' alkafirin 'iilaa fi dyae la yuqbl, wala yustjab
